meanings.definition: Keep safe from harm or injury.
meanings.sent1: Parents always protect their children from danger.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape could protect him from any harm.
meanings.sent4: The sturdy fortress walls protect the kingdom like a shield.
meanings.sent5: Wearing a helmet can protect your head during sports.

meanings.sent1: Soldiers protect their country from enemies.
meanings.sent2: A guard dog can protect a house from intruders.
meanings.sent3: The knight's shiny armor can protect him from dragon fire.
meanings.sent4: The laws of the land protect the rights of its citizens.
meanings.sent5: A password can protect your online accounts from hackers.

meanings.definition: Cover or shield from harm or danger.
meanings.sent1: Umbrellas protect us from getting wet in the rain.
meanings.sent2: Sunscreen can protect your skin from sunburn.
meanings.sent3: The thick walls of the castle protect the royal family.
meanings.sent4: A good antivirus program can protect your computer from viruses.
meanings.sent5: Wearing a seatbelt can protect you in case of a car accident.
